mean_cn: n. 危机，紧要关头，危险期
mean_en: a time of great danger, difficulty or confusion when problems must be solved or important decisions must be made; a time when a problem, a bad situation or an illness is at its worst point
sentence: After a series of crises, our company had to shut down.
sentence_trans: 经历一连串的危机后，我们的公司只能倒闭了。
word_etyma: cris危机 + es表复数→ crises危机，紧要关头
